fi.luupanu.skrapple.logic

Class SkrappleGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.luupanu.skrapple.logic.SkrappleGame

  • public class SkrappleGame
extends Object
    SkrappleGame is the class that is called to create a new game. It creates a new instance of Game and handles the final scoring of points.
    Author:
    panu

    • Method Detail

      • getGame

        public Game getGame()

      • doAction

        public ErrorMessage doAction(GameAction action)
        Performs an action if the game is still going on.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to be performed
        Returns:
        true if the action succeeded

      • doFinalScoring

        public List<Player> doFinalScoring()
        This method does the final scoring of the game. If a player resigned, her points are zeroed, if not, all remaining letter tiles in her rack are subtracted from the total score.
        Returns:
        a sorted list of players in winning order
